titleInfo.title: Culture of science teaching, workplace conditions, and instruction-focused science teacher cooperation in high schools. Some observations from the US and selected comparisons with the situation in Germany. Unveröffentlichter Forschungsbericht für die Arbeitsgruppe von Judith W. Little

bibliographicCitation.apa_indent: Kullmann, H. (Unpublished). Culture of science teaching, workplace conditions, and instruction-focused science teacher cooperation in high schools. Berkeley, USA: University of California.
